remarks: Value of isomorphism H for a lattice ` K ` .  Definition of isomorphism map in [Crawley] p. 122 line 3.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2014.)
statement:
dihval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihval.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihval.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihval.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihval.d $e |- D = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihval.c $e |- C = ( ( DIsoC ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihval.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
dihval.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihval $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( I ` X ) = if ( X .<_ W , ( D ` X ) , ( iota_ u e. S A. q e. A ( ( -. q .<_ W /\ ( q .\/ ( X ./\ W ) ) = X ) -> u = ( ( C ` q ) .(+) ( D ` ( X ./\ W ) ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A q $.
$d K q u $.
$d S u $.
$d W q u $.
$d X q u $.
